content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as a digital download above this gorgeous and cozy simply aqua infinity scarf is the perfect winter accessory it uses one skein of lion brand scarfie yarn but can easily be substituted for any other category 5 bulky weight yarn this is one of the december patterns of the 2017 scarf of the month club **materials ** * approximately 312 yds of category 5 bulky yarn i used lion brand scarfie in the charcoal/aqua colorway * size k 6 5mm crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
